name: XOL (Spirit Lamp)
description:
A new game for the NES! 

(disclaimer, no, it's not actually, it's more in spirit for the NES) 

XOL, a single axolotl out to adventure a vast mountain in the sea, is it a mountain at all? Collect abilities to explore more of the world!

KEYBOARD CONTROLLS:

D-Pad: Arrow Keys

A: Z key

B: X key

Select: Shift key

Start: Enter key

X-BOX CONTROLLS:

D-Pad: Left Joytick

A: A button

B: X button

Select: Select

Start: Start

(Best played with a controller, and best to zoom into the game at 175%)

This game was made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 3, it was made in 2 days, by myself.

I hope you enjoy it!
